name: mindvocab
description: - **Framework:** React 19.1.1 - **Language:** TypeScript 5.7+ - **Build Tool:** Vite 7.1.7 - **Styling:** Tailwind CSS v4.1.12 - **UI Components:** shadcn/ui (New York style) - **Routing:** React Router 7.8.1 - **State & Forms:** React Hook Form - **Notifications:** Sonner - **HTTP Client:** Axios 1.11.0

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
